name: Forcem.js
body:
forcem.js ========= a content placeholder toolkit Include `forcem.js` towards the end of the body tag. ## Usage Set elements class to `ipsum`. Use class `p-#` for paragraphs or `li-#` for lists where # is the number of paragraphs or list items you want displayed. ## Examples ### Paragraphs
### Lists
    ### Images Set `w-#` and `h-#` for width and height.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
